mapper.select: SELECT CITY_NUM as city_num, CITY_COUNTY as city_county, CITY_NAME as city_name FROM CITY WHERE ROWNUM <= 8

SELECT l.LAND_NUM as land_num, l.LAND_NAME as land_name, l.LAND_TITLE as land_title, l.CITY_NUM as city_num, c.CITY_NAME as city_name FROM landmark l JOIN city c ON l.CITY_NUM = c.CITY_NUM WHERE c.CITY_NUM = #{city_num} AND ROWNUM <= 4

SELECT c.COM_NUM as com_num, c.COM_TITLE as com_title, substr(c.com_regi, 1, 8) as com_regi, m.MEM_NICK as mem_nick, c.CITY_NAME as city_name FROM community c JOIN member m ON c.MEM_ID = m.MEM_ID WHERE c.CITY_NUM = #{city_num} AND ROWNUM <= 2
